seo: Nginx,远程整数溢出漏洞,CVE-2017-7529,检测插件
summary: 该插件用于检测Nginx是否存在远程整数溢出漏洞（CVE-2017-7529），通过发送特定的HTTP请求并分析响应来判断目标是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether Nginx has the remote integer overflow vulnerability (CVE-2017-7529) by sending specific HTTP requests and analyzing the responses to determine if the target is affected.
